divs: sighting detailsoctober 14 th at approximately 8 pm went outdoors to take photos of the orbs & ufos which i've noticed through the window . upon taking the photos with a flash on the lightships really power up with a huge surge of light coming from them which makes them appear on photos really well . at this point when i click on the camera in sequence i'm able to see whether the ships come much closer & or which direction they fly to or if they hover in the area . it's quiet spectacular to witness these sightings ! after taking several photos , i've thank them telepathically & went indoors to review the images . i'm attaching 1 zoomed in image of 1 of the magnificent looking crafts in which the structure can be seen . this photo is already included in a video on yt titled : ufo \ ovni lightships in the sky continues :) if anyone's interested at mufon in seeing more of all the photographs then please access it there .
Summary: Bright UFOs continue to appear over Toronto .
